name: Dragons of Stormwreck Isle
summary: In this adventure, our heroes must save Stormwreck Isle from its fatal fate: A dragon are preparing a ritual to become stronger and will consume all the island if this ritual is completed , leading to its destruction.

chapters.title: Chapter one
chapterSummary: Our adventures arrive to Storm Wreck Isle looking for fortune and glory.
Once there, they meet the people of Dragons Rest, who entrust them with the mission of rescuing the island from a Dragon.
The heroes head to a cave to investigate a mistery, but halfway through they seem to run into trouble, as an enemies attacks them.
